name: Dynomighty
subtitle: Bringing focus, prioritization and stability to their mighty! operation as one of Inc. Magazine's fastest growing private companies.

As Dynomighty Design Inc. catapulted into position #758 on Inc. Magazineâ€™s Top 5,000 fastest growing private companies, as most fast growing companies do, it was facing growing pains.

Having achieved tremendous growth through wholesale, international distribution and through an intuitive eCommerce strategy supported by viral marketing and centered around innovative design products, Dynomighty had grown beyond its infrastructure.

Seeing an opportunity to streamline operations and stabilize growth.

Given a sales trajectory that was not comprehensively supported through its operation infrastructure and in partnership with the Dynomighty team, n e t a formulated a growth plan using strategic planning methods that prioritized human resource growth, financial (capital) stability, and identified the most efficient sales channels in which to focus revenue growth opportunities.
